TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Matrix extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 表示 3x3 仿射轉換矩陣，可用於 2-D 空間中的轉換。

span.span: Represents a 3x3 affine transformation matrix used for transformations in 2-D space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 3x3 矩陣用於轉換[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_2d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-2d-md.md)]x-y 平面。A 3x3 matrix is used for transformations in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_2d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-2d-md.md)] x-y plane. 您可以以形成的線性轉換，例如旋轉及傾斜 （傾斜），後面接著轉譯任何數目乘上仿射轉換矩陣。Affine transformation matrices can be multiplied to form any number of linear transformations, such as rotation and skew (shear), followed by translation. 非仿射轉換矩陣有其等於 （0，0，1），因此只有前兩個資料行必須指定成員的最後一個資料行。An affine transformation matrix has its final column equal to (0, 0, 1), so only the members in the first two columns need to be specified. 請注意向量會表示為資料列向量，非資料行向量。Note that vectors are expressed as row-vectors, not column vectors. A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 會使用以列為主要順序儲存，且具有下列結構：A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is stored using row-major order and has the following structure: |||| |-|-|-| |||00| |||00| |||11| 在最後一個資料列中，成員和，代表翻譯值。The members in the last row, and , represent translation values. 在方法和屬性，位於轉換矩陣通常指定為只有六個成員，具有的向量，如下所示：In methods and properties, the transformation matrix is usually specified as a vector with only six members, as follows: (, , , , , )(, , , , , ) 雖然您可以使用結構，直接將轉譯的個別點，或使用物件，轉換[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]也提供一組可讓您將物件轉換而不需要直接使用矩陣的類別：， ， ，和。Although you can use a structure directly to translate individual points, or with a to transform objects, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] also provides a set of classes that enable you to transform objects without working directly with matrices: , , , and . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *m11**m11* 中的第一個資料列和第一個資料行，這個值。The value in the first row and first column of this . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *m12**m12* 中的第一個資料列和第二個資料行的值。The value in the first row and second column. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *m21**m21* 中的第二個資料列和第一個資料行的值。The value in the second row and first column. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *m22**m22* 中的第二個資料列和第二個資料行的值。The value in the second row and second column. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *offsetX**offsetX* 中的第三個資料列和第一個資料行的值。The value in the third row and first column. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *offsetY**offsetY* 中的第三個資料列和第二個資料行的值。The value in the third row and second column. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property.

span.span: Appends the specified structure to this structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業相當於乘以這參數的結構`matrix`。This operation is the same as multiplying this structure by the parameter `matrix`. 矩陣相乘不交替，不過，因此這項作業不是相同乘以參數`matrix`由此結構; 也就是說，(這 \* `matrix`) 不相同 (`matrix` \* 這)。Matrix multiplication is not commutative, though, so this operation is not the same as multiplying the parameter `matrix` by this structure; that is, (this \* `matrix`) is not the same as (`matrix` \* this). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何附加到另一個結構結構。The following example shows how to append a structure to another structure. [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixRotateAboutPointExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixrotateaboutpointexample_csharp)]

summary.span: 判斷兩個指定的 結構是否具有相同的值。

span.span: Determines whether the two specified structures have the same values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > A將其值儲存為雙精度浮點數。A stores its values as doubles. 因為值它，比較兩個執行算術運算時可能會遺失有效位數邏輯上相等的結構可能會失敗。Because the value of a can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two structures that are logically equal might fail. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何檢查兩個結構是否相等。The following example shows how to check two structures for equality. [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixEqualityExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixequalityexample_csharp)]

summary.span: 取得單位 。

span.span: Gets an identity .
An identity matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 身分識別矩陣具有 1 的值在係數 [1，1]，[2，2] [3，3]，在其餘係數中的 0 值。An identity matrix has a value of 1 in coefficients [1,1],[2,2],[3,3] and a value of 0 in the rest of the coefficients. 這與設定相互關聯並為 1 和， ， ，和設為 0。This correlates to setting and to 1 and , , , and to 0. 在仿射矩陣，這是實作可[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]用於，結構，係數 [3，1]，[3，2]，[3.3] 一定要有值 0,0,1 分別隱含。In an affine matrix, which is the implementation that [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses for the , structure, coefficients [3,1],[3,2],[3.3] are implied to always have the values 0,0,1 respectively. |||| |-|-|-| |11|00|00| |00|11|00| |00|00|11| 如需身分識別矩陣中，方法會傳回字串"Identity"而不是係數的。For an identity matrix, the method returns the string "Identity" instead of the coefficients of the . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擷取矩陣。The following example shows how to retrieve the matrix. [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixIdentityExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixidentityexample_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法交替矩陣相乘。Matrix multiplication is not commutative. 乘以`trans1`所`trans2`不是相同乘以`trans2`由`trans1`。Multiplying `trans1` by `trans2` is not the same as multiplying `trans2` by `trans1`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何乘以兩個結構。The following example shows how to multiply two structures. [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixMultiplicationExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixmultiplicationexample_csharp)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Prepend (System.Windows.Media.Matrix matrix);
.method public hidebysig instance void Prepend(valuetype System.Windows.Media.Matrix matrix) cil managed
public: void Prepend(System::Windows::Media::Matrix matrix);
member this.Prepend : System.Windows.Media.Matrix -> unit

param.name: matrix
param.span: 要在這個 結構之前加上的 結構。

span.span: The structure to prepend to this structure.

summary.span: 在這個 結構之前加上指定的 結構。

span.span: Prepends the specified structure onto this structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業會乘以參數相同`matrix`由此結構。This operation is the same as multiplying the parameter `matrix` by this structure. 矩陣相乘不交替，不過，因此這項作業不是相同乘以這參數的結構`matrix`，亦即`matrix`\* 這不是與此相同 \* `matrix`。Matrix multiplication is not commutative, however, so this operation is not the same as multiplying this structure by the parameter `matrix`; that is, `matrix` \* this is not the same as this \* `matrix`. 在複合的轉換中，個別轉換的順序很重要的。In a composite transformation, the order of individual transformations is important. 例如，如果先旋轉，再調整，然後轉譯，得到不同的結果比先轉換再旋轉，然後調整。For example, if you first rotate, then scale, then translate, you get a different result than if you first translate, then rotate, then scale. 順序很重要的其中一個原因是，例如旋轉和縮放轉換會完成方面座標系統的原點。One reason order is significant is that transformations like rotation and scaling are done with respect to the origin of the coordinate system. 縮放中心位於原點的物件產生不同的結果調整已離開來源的物件。Scaling an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than scaling an object that has been moved away from the origin. 同樣地，旋轉的中心位於原點的物件所產生的旋轉物件已移動離開來源不同的結果。Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在前面加上拖曳至另一個。The following example shows how to prepend a onto another . [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixPrependExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixprependexample_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在複合的轉換中，個別轉換的順序很重要的。In a composite transformation, the order of individual transformations is important. 例如，如果先旋轉，再調整，然後轉譯，得到不同的結果比先轉換再旋轉，然後調整。For example, if you first rotate, then scale, then translate, you get a different result than if you first translate, then rotate, then scale. 順序很重要的其中一個原因是，例如旋轉和縮放轉換會完成方面座標系統的原點。One reason order is significant is that transformations like rotation and scaling are done with respect to the origin of the coordinate system. 縮放中心位於原點的物件產生不同的結果調整已離開來源的物件。Scaling an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than scaling an object that has been moved away from the origin. 同樣地，旋轉的中心位於原點的物件所產生的旋轉物件已移動離開來源不同的結果。Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在前面加上旋轉。The following example shows how to prepend a rotation to a . [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixPrependRotateExamples_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixprependrotateexamples_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在複合的轉換中，個別轉換的順序很重要的。In a composite transformation, the order of individual transformations is important. 例如，如果先旋轉，再調整，然後轉譯，得到不同的結果比先轉換再旋轉，然後調整。For example, if you first rotate, then scale, then translate, you get a different result than if you first translate, then rotate, then scale. 順序很重要的其中一個原因是，例如旋轉和縮放轉換會完成方面座標系統的原點。One reason order is significant is that transformations like rotation and scaling are done with respect to the origin of the coordinate system. 縮放中心位於原點的物件產生不同的結果調整已離開來源的物件。Scaling an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than scaling an object that has been moved away from the origin. 同樣地，旋轉的中心位於原點的物件所產生的旋轉物件已移動離開來源不同的結果。Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在前面加上調整規模以。The following example shows how to prepend a scale to a . [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixPrependScaleExamples_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixprependscaleexamples_csharp)]

summary.span: 將這個 結構變更為單位矩陣。

span.span: Changes this structure into an identity matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 身分識別矩陣具有 1 的值在係數 [1，1]，[2，2] [3，3]，在其餘係數中的 0 值。An identity matrix has a value of 1 in coefficients [1,1],[2,2],[3,3] and a value of 0 in the rest of the coefficients. 這與設定相互關聯並為 1 和， ， ，和設為 0。This correlates to setting and to 1 and , , , and to 0. 在仿射矩陣，這是實作可[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]用於結構，係數 [3，1]，[3，2]，[3.3] 一定要有值 0,0,1 分別隱含。In an affine matrix, which is the implementation that [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses for the structure, coefficients [3,1],[3,2],[3.3] are implied to always have the values 0,0,1 respectively. |||| |-|-|-| |11|00|00| |00|11|00| |00|00|11| 如需身分識別矩陣中，方法會傳回字串"Identity"，而不是係數的。For an identity matrix, the method returns the string "Identity", instead of the coefficients of the . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何開啟為單位矩陣的結構。The following example shows how to turn a structure into an identity matrix. [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixIdentityExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixidentityexample_csharp)]

span.span: Appends a skew of the specified degrees in the x and y dimensions to this structure.

remarks.format: ## Examples 此範例示範如何以扭曲結構。This example shows how to skew a structure. [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixSkewExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixskewexample_csharp)]

Public Sub SkewPrepend (skewX As Double, skewY As Double)

member this.SkewPrepend : double * double -> unit

param.name: skewX
param.span: 用來扭曲這個 的 X 維度角度。

span.span: The angle in the x dimension by which to skew this .

param.name: skewY
param.span: 用來扭曲這個 的 Y 維度角度。

span.span: The angle in the y dimension by which to skew this .

summary.span: 在這個 結構之前加上指定的 X 和 Y 維度度數的扭曲。

span.span: Prepends a skew of the specified degrees in the x and y dimensions to this structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在複合的轉換中，個別轉換的順序很重要的。In a composite transformation, the order of individual transformations is important. 例如，如果先旋轉，再調整，然後轉譯，得到不同的結果比先轉換再旋轉，然後調整。For example, if you first rotate, then scale, then translate, you get a different result than if you first translate, then rotate, then scale. 順序很重要的其中一個原因是，例如旋轉和縮放轉換會完成方面座標系統的原點。One reason order is significant is that transformations like rotation and scaling are done with respect to the origin of the coordinate system. 縮放中心位於原點的物件產生不同的結果調整已離開來源的物件。Scaling an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than scaling an object that has been moved away from the origin. 同樣地，旋轉的中心位於原點的物件所產生的旋轉物件已移動離開來源不同的結果。Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin. ## Examples 此範例示範如何在前面加上要扭曲結構。This example shows how to prepend a skew to a structure. [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixSkewPrependExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixskewprependexample_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在複合的轉換中，個別轉換的順序很重要的。In a composite transformation, the order of individual transformations is important. 例如，如果先旋轉，再調整，然後轉譯，得到不同的結果比先轉換再旋轉，然後調整。For example, if you first rotate, then scale, then translate, you get a different result than if you first translate, then rotate, then scale. 順序很重要的其中一個原因是，例如旋轉和縮放轉換會完成方面座標系統的原點。One reason order is significant is that transformations like rotation and scaling are done with respect to the origin of the coordinate system. 縮放中心位於原點的物件產生不同的結果調整已離開來源的物件。Scaling an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than scaling an object that has been moved away from the origin. 同樣地，旋轉的中心位於原點的物件所產生的旋轉物件已移動離開來源不同的結果。Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何附加在前面的轉譯到結構。The following example shows how prepend a translation onto a structure. [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixTranslatePrependExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixtranslateprependexample_csharp)]
